content.text:
# Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Sound Mixing for a Reality Program

}}
The Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Sound Mixing for a Reality Program is awarded to one reality series each year. Prior to 2023, nonfiction programs and reality programs competed together. From 2019 to 2022, nominations were proportional to the number of submissions of each. They were split in 2023 with Outstanding Sound Mixing for a Nonfiction Program becoming its own category.
